column5: I love my Toyota but not the company that makes itToyota supports insurrectionists in congress and I just cannot take it.The company shares in some of the blame.They bankroll those folks in the company’s name.I’ve owned a Toyota for so many yearsbut…next purchase they'll find me changing gears.I’m not going to help fund anti-democracy insurrectionsGoodbye Toyota until you change your political directions. 7/7/21
